name: Nate Carlisle
text: I've called probably 30 times over 6 years and not once has the phone been answered. Assuming they are out of business.

name: Santana Brooks
text: One of my preferred places to grab something to eat. awesome location, neat, and awesome service. Very good job!

name: Michael Mocerino
text: I’m from the east coast so I was skeptical of pizza here but I was pleasantly surprised. The pizza was delicious and the crust was awesome. Had a small issue with the price quoted incorrectly but they handled it well and very professionally. Will be back again!

name: Jess Brown
text: This location has always been on time and has the best crust compared to other local locations. I always get the lady delivery driver and she is fantastic.

name: Crystal Hurmiz
text: It was snowing outside and the guy who worked there literally went outside and hand delivered my pizza to my car! He didn't have to do that. So nice.

name: Travis Goodroe
text: Everyone likes their pizza differently, but this place is my perfect kind of pizza. Try it to see if you like it.

name: Carlos Eubanks
text: Family favorite. Pizzas always on point. Good courteous staff.

name: John Wilson
text: Won’t be ordering from here again. So sad as this place used to be really good. Started ordering here back in ‘03. Not so much anymore. Quality has nosedived over the last few years. Ordered a Howie Maui and it was so greasy the bottom of …More

name: abhiram r
text: Nice of them to have delivered even when it was severely snowing

name: Elsy Rodriguez
text: BEST pizza in town!!! Extra cheese really means EXTRA CHEESE here!!

name: Karen Webster
text: This particular Hungry Howie's has an excellent chef. The sauce is not too salty and has a very pleasant taste, blending in wonderfully with the ample addition of toppings.  They have great delivery persons, too.  They even remember the pop!

name: Mandy
text: We love this Hungry Howie's and usually order about once a week.

name: ed arseneault
text: We rarely get a chance to, but on the rare occasion that we do, besides the great food and prices, is the people that have worked at this location. And that REALLY makes a difference.

name: Private first name Private last name
text: Three months ago I got 3 cheeser bread and the manger harassed my mom and stuff and looked NOTHING like the advertising and I threw up after eating and now I tried it again same stuff it was horrible I told the employee who made it I’m …More

name: Leigh Fehr
text: Their pizza is a little more expensive but I like it once in a while just because of the flavored crusts. They also top the pizza fairly well.

name: Asia Diane
text: Least favorite location. Greasy, poorly made and thrown together EVERY time

name: Lane Silvi
text: Terrible experience. Well over an hour to be delivered, pizza was undercooked, slid halfway across the box ended up stuffed in the corner, toppings were added after it was cooked, bread was cold pieces laying upside down on top of others …More

name: Mark Sweetman
text: I came in at closing time and they still took my order. That is worth 5 stars.

name: Joseph.Lighting
text: The food is good service is okay but the staff is a little bit different. They said some funny things on the phone and they weren't very professional but I guess you got to understand that when you go to a pizza joint you're dealing with children often times people they are 18 19 years old

name: will tebor
text: Just got a pizza from there.  Ordered a flavored crust which wasn't there.  It also took 45 minutes for the driver to go a mile and a half down the road.  Luckily they did quote me a 40 minute delivery time.  Also the driver was rude.  Will be calling corporate about the driver.

name: Taylor Driscoll
text: Horrible management and poor results. I ordered a deep dish pizza and a side of 3 cheese bread. The pizza came out uneven, so much so that the thicker side was uncooked, and the crust was thinner than the bread. I called to let the store …More

name: Jeremy Davis
text: Employees were awesome, but first time having the pizza. Maybe I will get a more expensive pizza. The boneless chicken were perfect though!  Will be back

name: cichlids of michigan
text: I bought a three cheese bread and it was a small pizza with mostly mozzarella cheese barley any cheaper cheese and the other cheese no three cheese at other locations has mozzarella cheese it has cheeder cheese astaigo and parm this is not …More

name: John Lane
text: Love this place, it's done up right!! Everything but the hours!!  Sometimes I crave it for lunch and have to drive to the 12 & middlebelt location..... BOO!! ;)

name: S R
text: I ordered from here again great howie roll, staff was nice and friendly.

name: Hollie Born
text: This store has the best pizza!! They top all the Hungry Howies I have been too!!!

name: Melvandale liquore Shirttyy
text: Good pizza to get it delivered the area is very treacherous the mobile home park seems to have interesting characters lingering around this parking lot

name: Matthew Larzelere
text: Love the pizza and Emily loves cookie pizza

name: Mr Constantin
text: Would I be honest saying I recommend Hungry Howie's, no I wouldn't, except at this location. …More

name: Stephen Gibbens
text: This particular location seems to be better and more consistent than other HH's I've been to.

name: Elizabeth bursey
text: They serve gluten free pizza.it taste pretty good.

name: Daniela P.
text: Seriously great pizza (& boneless wings). And service is always friendly.

name: Zsa Zsa Girl
text: Absolutely love this location. The owners are awesome & the pizza is always fresh, hot & delicious.

name: Kevin Hagen
text: Love that stuffed crust..

name: Shannon Schneider
text: Great food (tastes exactly like Hungry Howie's should). We eat here all the time because it is close, quick and all the employees are super cool.

name: Jennifer Berkemeier
text: Fast, good pizza, low price

name: Amanda Lanning
text: Good food, friendly workers. Just wish they opened earlier

name: Anthony Pugh
text: Solid pizza with fast deliver. Jamie the driver, yeah he's cool!

name: Nylaj E
text: Made my pizza how they wanted to instead of how I asked

name: chris graham
text: Best Howies around moved to Wixom but stop here on the way home from work because they make better pizza and actually listen to my order

name: Barbara Gordon-Klavons Gordon-Klavons
text: Quick Service! Pretty Good Pizza for the the $

name: Kirklin Morris
text: Service outstanding and your pizza is hot.

name: Anthony Hood
text: Great stuffed pizza, and then some.

name: Anna Molnar
text: Haven't been here in year but pizza was always cooked right back in the day when I used to go here. Moved back to area might go soon

name: Daniel Halbany
text: Very friendly even when lots of orders coming in

name: Marie Susalla
text: Loved the pizza for 3.14 0n pi day

text: Great food good service.

name: Alex Clarke
text: It always tastes great and it's always fast.
